mapper.select: SELECT A.order_detail_id, A.order_id, A.system_id, C.system_name, C.system_price, B.admin_name AS create_user, DATE_FORMAT(A.create_time, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS create_time, B.admin_name AS update_user, DATE_FORMAT(A.update_time, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS update_time FROM bank_worker_biz.bank_order_detail A LEFT JOIN bank_worker_base.system_admin B ON A.create_user = B.admin_id LEFT JOIN bank_worker_base.system_setting C ON A.system_id = C.system_id WHERE A.order_id = #{arg0,jdbcType=INTEGER} ORDER BY A.update_time DESC;
